page.title: 12Hall Farm.
page.content: Hall Farm is part of {The Cheshire {College of Agriculture}.Students from all over the world come to the college to learn how to become farmers. Most of the students become dairy farmers. At Hall Farm there are 150 black and white{Friesian}cows. These cows are milked twice daily. They are cleaned before being milked so that they don't infect the milk. Each cow gives about 20 to 25 litres of milk a day.They are milked by machines, although they could be milked by hand if the machines ever broke down. The milk goes from the milking machines to big,stainless steel tanks where it is kept cool so that the bacteria in it can not grow. Tankers collect the milk and take it to factories and to bottling plants. Most of the milk is used to make the famous{Cheshire Cheese}.
